text: Azerbaijan competed at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships in Gwangju, South Korea from 12 to 28 July. ==Swimming== Azerbaijan entered one swimmer. ;Men {| class="wikitable" style="text-align:center; font-size:90%" |- !rowspan="2"|Athlete !rowspan="2"|Event !colspan="2"|Heat !colspan="2"|Semifinal !colspan="2"|Final |-style="font-size:95%" !Time !Rank !Time !Rank !Time !Rank |- |align=left rowspan=2|Maksym Shemberev |align=left|200 m butterfly |1:57.14 |16 Q |1:56.78 |12 |colspan=2|Did not advance |- |align=left|400 m individual medley |4:14.62 |6 Q |colspan=2 |4:14.10 |6 |} ==References== Category:Nations at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships Category:Azerbaijan at the World Aquatics Championships World Aquatics
title: Azerbaijan at the 2019 World Aquatics Championships
